page.title: 19BOARDERS AT SCHOOL:PARKGATE
page.content: We are members of{Mostyn House {School, Parkgate.}We get up at{ {7.30a.m.}and have breakfast at{7.55. We have a short{Chapel service}and then{5 lessons}before lunch, with two breaks. Three more lessons follow before we have an hour's{games period. We play tennis, cricket, netball and rounders while swimming and athletics are popular as well. In the{evenings}we may do prep or have free time.{Bedtimes}are from{7.30 to{9.00p.m.}depending on age. A good thing about our School is that we have many{hobbies}to keep us busy. Some of these are{the choir, {woodwork,shooting}and{photography.} If we are naughty we get a blue piece of paper, a{stripe.}If we are good at work we get a pink paper called a{star.}A public notice tells us how many we have got of each.
